goal.ch: 本課程的目標是理解過渡金屬化學的基本概念和原理，包括過渡金屬元素的性質、電子結構、反應機制和催化作用等。此外，學生將學習過渡金屬化學在合成、反應、催化、材料科學和生物無機化學等方面的應用，並理解相關技術和應用
goal.en: The goal of this course is to understand the basic concepts and principles of transition metal chemistry, including the properties, electronic structures, reaction mechanisms and catalytic effects of transition metal elements. In addition, students will study applications of transition metal chemistry in synthesis, reactions, catalysis, materials science and bioinorganic chemistry, and understand related techniques and applications.

outline.ch:
第 1 週：課程介紹與基礎無機化學
第 2 週：金屬錯合物基礎：金屬和配體 - 金屬離子作為路易斯酸；配位子類型
第 3 週：過渡金屬錯合物中的鍵合 - 八面體錯合物的晶體場理論；金屬錯合物的分子軌道；金屬錯合物中的 π 鍵
第 4 週：配位幾何構型 - Jahn-Teller 效應； 18 電子規則；異構物
第 5 週：配位幾何構型和第一次考試
第 6 週：d 金屬錯合物的化學 - 氧化還原電位；氧化態；生物過渡金屬化學振動光譜和共振拉曼光譜
第 7 週：d 金屬錯合物的化學 - 4d 和 5d 元素；有機金屬化合物；金屬-金屬鍵結
第 8 週：鍵結的更多細節 - 分子形狀和對稱性
第 9 週：鍵結的更多細節 - 配體場理論和電子光譜學
第 10 週：鍵結的更多細節和第二次考試
第 11 週：配位子與過渡金屬 - 金屬氫化物、二氫錯合物和抓氫鍵
第 12 週：配位子與過渡金屬 - 磷和卡賓配位子； π鍵烯烴、炔烴配位子
第 13 週：過渡金屬錯合物的反應 - 配位子取代反應；氧化還原反應；光化學
第 14 週：過渡金屬錯合物的反應 - 氧化加成和還原消除；插入反應；親核/親電加成和抽取反應
第 15 週：有機金屬催化
第 16 週：有機金屬催化 - 文獻回顧
第 17 週：學生報告
第 18 週：學生報告和期末考試
outline.en:
課程大綱(英文)：
Three hours weekly
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Fundamentals of Metal Complexes: Metals and Ligands - Metal Ions as Lewis Acids; Types of Ligands
Week 3: Bonding in Transition Metal Complexes - Crystal Field Theory for Octahedral Complexes; Molecular Orbital of Metal Complexes; π-bonding in Metal Complexes
Week 4: Coordination Geometries - The Jahn-Teller Effect ; The 18 e– Rule; Isomerism
Week 5: Coordination Geometries (continue) and First Exam
Week 6: Chemistry of the d-block Complexes- Redox Potentials; Oxidation States; Biological Transition Metal Chemistry Vibrational Spectra, and Resonance Raman Spectroscopy
Week 7: Chemistry of the d-block Complexes- 4d and 5d Elements; Organometallic Compounds; Metal-metal Bonding
Week 8: Bonding in More Detail - Molecular Shape and Symmetry
Week 9: Bonding in More Detail - Ligand Field Theory and Electronic Spectroscopy
Week 10: Bonding in More Detail (continue) and Second Exam
Week 11: Ligands with Transition Metals- Metal Hydride, Dihydrogen Complexes, and Agostic Interactions
Week 12: Ligands with Transition Metals - Phosphine and Carbene Ligands; π-bonding Alkene, Alkyne Ligands
Week 13: Reactions of Transition Metal Complexes - Ligand Substitution; Redox Reactions; Photochemistry
Week 14: Reactions of Transition Metal Complexes - Oxidative Addition and Reductive Elimination; Insertion Reactions; Nucleophilic/Electrophillic Addition and Abstraction
Week 15: Organometallic Catalysis
Week 16: Organometallic Catalysis - Literature Review
Week 17: Student Presentation
Week 18: Student Presentation and Final Exam

textbook.en: Lecture notes will be provided by each professor.

gradMethod.ch: 評分將基於三次考試 (30％)、一次期末考試 (40％) 和一次期末報告 (30％)。

flexDiscription.ch: 在第17週和第18週，每位學生都需要在過渡金屬化學領域選擇一個特定主題，並準備一個 15-20 分鐘的關於該主題的演講。該課程的學生演示部分為學生提供了一個機會，可以在培養研究和演示技能的同時加深他們對過渡金屬化學的了解。通過提供組織良好的演示並接收來自同行的反饋，學生將培養學術界和工業界高度重視的技能，例如分析和綜合信息以及向不同受眾傳達複雜科學概念的能力。
flexDiscription.en: In week 17 and 18, each student will be required to choose a specific topic within the field of transition metal chemistry and prepare a 15-20 minute presentation on that topic. The student presentation component of the course is an opportunity for students to deepen their knowledge of transition metal chemistry while developing research and presentation skills. By delivering a well-organized presentation and receiving feedback from peers, students will develop valuable skills that are highly va

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch: 系所:限化學學系碩士班、化學學系博士班。
系所:限化學學系。年級:限四年級。
en: Department:MSc in Chemistry、PhD in Chemistry only.
Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Fourth Year only.
